Jimmy Young, Product Designer

MyDomino.com

Redesigning the main website using a design sprint exercise

About

Our website was in need of an overhaul, so I suggested using a design sprint exercise to facilitate the design decisions. I included our developer,concierge coordinator, and marketing director.

Kickoff

I started the process by gathering the competitorâ€™s user flows and put that side by side with our current design. This way, I can make sure that participants all start on the same foot.
